attributes.action: Promote the establishing of a central data base within all councils, for the accessing of risk assessments which are vital for Health and Safety representatives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: County councils seem to let each department keep their own risk assessments in house, which makes the accessing of them complicated. An established  central data base for all departments, would cut down the man power and time wasted in finding them, helping the Safety reps do their work more effectively and help prevent accidents within the workplace
